name: ulcerative
content:

affected by or involving ulcers (= breaks in the skin, or on the surface of an organ inside the body, that do not heal naturally): The area is healing well and appears not to be becoming ulcerative. An endoscopy revealed an ulcerative tumour.
More examplesFewer examplesThe lesions may appear as large ulcerative areas.The term lupus refers to a range of ulcerative skin diseases that rapidly eat away flesh. Nausea, vomiting, and ulcerative stomatitis are common side effects of this medication.
